original_text: But as for you, Babylon's king, they have thrown you out! You have no grave! You are like a branch that has broken off. You lie among the dead bodies of soldiers that their enemies have killed with their swords. They have thrown your body into a big hole in the rocks, and they have walked over it. But as for you, Babylon's king, they have thrown you out! You have no grave! You are like a branch that has broken off. You lie among the dead bodies of soldiers that their enemies have killed with their swords. They have thrown your body into a big hole in the rocks, and they have walked over it. But as for you, Babylon's king, they have thrown you out! You have no grave! You are like a branch that has broken off. You lie among the dead bodies of soldiers that their enemies have killed with their swords. They have thrown your body into a big hole in the rocks, and they have walked over it.
korean_text: 오직 너는 자기 무덤에서 내쫓겼으니 가증한 나무 가지 같고 칼에 찔려 돌구덩이에 떨어진 주검들에 둘려싸였으니 밟힌 시체와 같도다

sentences.original_text: But as for you, Babylon's king
they have thrown you out!
You have no grave!
You are like a branch that has broken off.
You lie among the dead bodies of soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 죽은 군사들의 시체들 사이에 누워 있으니

sentences.original_text: that their enemies have killed with their swords.
They have thrown your body into a big hole in the rocks,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 네 시체를 바위 구덩이에 던졌고

sentences.original_text: and they have walked over it.

they have thrown you out!
You have no grave!
You are like a branch that has broken off.
You lie among the dead bodies of soldiers
